replies.msg:
Dear Members of HKUST,

We are in deep sadness to learn of the passing of Mr. Chow Tsz-Lok, Alex.

Members of the University community have shown grave concerns about the incident. To allow us as a community to understand more, a portal is created to share related information. The link to the portal is TKO1104.ust.hk.

Office of the President

科大人有啲乜嘢新線索可以入返條link，upload返相關證據上去
